title: Authorizes and directs the office for the aging to study the feasibility of creating a state-wide program to track certain elderly individuals
summary: Authorizes and directs the office for the aging to study the feasibility of creating a state-wide program to track certain elderly individuals; requires the office for the aging to prepare a report on their findings.
actClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing and directing the office for the aging to study the feasibility of creating a state-wide program to track certain elderly individuals
